languages.text: Руки мертвеца обагрены кровью, а с освежеванного лица свисают лоскуты кожи.

traits.locale_text: Руки мертвеца обагрены кровью, а с осввежеванного лица свисают лоскуты кожи.
Руки мертвеца обагрены кровью, а с освежеванного лица свисают лоскуты кожи.

languages.text: The dead person's hands are stained red with blood, and strips of skin dangle from their flayed face.
languages.original_text: Руки мертвеца обагрены кровью, а с освежеванного лица свисают лоскуты кожи.

traits.locale_text: The dead person's hands are stained red with blood, and strips of skin dangle from their flayed face.
The dead person's hands are stained red with blood, and strips of skin dangle from their flayed face.
The dead person's hands are stained red with blood, and strips of skin dangle from their flayed face.
The dead person's hands are stained red with blood, and strips of skin dangle from their flayed face.

languages.text: 这个死人的双手被鲜血染红了，被剥开的脸上挂着一条一条的皮肤。
languages.original_text: The dead person's hands are stained red with blood, and strips of skin dangle from their flayed face.

traits.locale_text: 这个死人的双手被鲜血染红了，被剥开的脸上挂着一条一条的皮肤。

languages.text: Las manos del cadáver están teñidas de sangre y tiras de piel cuelgan de su cara despellejada.
languages.original_text: The dead person's hands are stained red with blood, and strips of skin dangle from their flayed face.

traits.locale_text: Las manos del cadáver están teñidas de sangre y tiras de piel cuelgan de su cara despellejada.

languages.text: 死者の手は血で赤く染まり、剥がれた顔からは皮膚の切れ端が垂れ下がっている。
languages.original_text: The dead person's hands are stained red with blood, and strips of skin dangle from their flayed face.

traits.locale_text: 死者の手は血で赤く染まり、剥がれた顔からは皮膚の切れ端が垂れ下がっている。

languages.text: Die Hände der toten Person sind blutverschmiert. Von ihrem zerschundenen Gesicht hängen einige Hautfetzen.
languages.original_text: The dead person's hands are stained red with blood, and strips of skin dangle from their flayed face.

traits.locale_text: Die Hände der toten Person sind blutverschmiert. Von ihrem zerschundenen Gesicht hängen einige Hautfetzen.

languages.text: Les mains de la victime sont maculées de sang, et des lambeaux de peau arrachée pendent de son visage écorché.
languages.original_text: The dead person's hands are stained red with blood, and strips of skin dangle from their flayed face.

traits.locale_text: Les mains de la victime sont maculées de sang, et des lambeaux de peau arrachée pendent de son visage écorché.

languages.text: Cesedin elleri, kanla kırmızıya boyanmış; soyulmuş yüzünden de deri parçaları sallanıyor.
languages.original_text: The dead person's hands are stained red with blood, and strips of skin dangle from their flayed face.

traits.locale_text: Cesedin elleri kanla kırmızıya boyanmış ve soyulmuş yüzünden deri parçaları sallanıyor.
